QuestData.Title: Grave Consequences
QuestData.Description: We've found ancient mogu burial urns among the ruins on Shan'ze Dao.$B$BThis is normally no problem, except these urns are home to angry mogu spirits.$B$BNot only do these urns pose a danger to anyone unlucky enough to find one, but they could be used for destruction if they were to fall into the wrong hands.$B$BWe must rid Shan'ze Dao of their presence.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 24 Shan'ze Ancestors. Shan'ze Ancestors may be found inside Mogu Burial Urns.
